00010 #define topSpeed 2000
00011 
00016 void joyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& msg){
00017         //If the Left Button is Pressed
00018         if (msg->buttons[LEFT_BUTTON] >.1) {
00019                 //If the start and select buttons are pressed, enable boom control
00020                 if(msg->buttons[SELECT_BUTTON]>0 && msg->buttons[START_BUTTON]>0){
00021                         if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] > 0)
00022                                 sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,3000);
00023                         else if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] < 0)
00024                                 sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,-3000);
00025                         else sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,0);
00026                 }
00027                 //Joystick DPAD will control stepping of motors
00028                 else if(msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] != 0 || msg->axes[D_PAD_LEFT_RIGHT] !=0){
00029                         if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] > 0)
00030                                 sendPositionMessage(tiltMotor, -upDownStep, false);
00031                         else if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] < 0)
00032                                 sendPositionMessage(tiltMotor, upDownStep, false);
00033                         if (msg->axes[D_PAD_LEFT_RIGHT] > 0)
00034                                 sendPositionMessage(panMotor, -leftRightStep, false);
00035                         else if (msg->axes[D_PAD_LEFT_RIGHT] < 0)
00036                                 sendPositionMessage(panMotor, leftRightStep, false);
00037                 }
00038                 //Control velocities with joysticks
00039                 else{
00040                         if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] < 0){
00041                                 if(abs(tiltMotor.currentPosition - tiltMotor.maxValue)
00042                                                 < abs(tiltMotor.homePos-tiltMotor.maxValue)*.1)
00043                                          sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,0);
00044                                 else sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00045                         }
00046                         else if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00047                                 if(abs(tiltMotor.currentPosition - tiltMotor.minValue) <
00048                                                 abs(tiltMotor.homePos-tiltMotor.minValue)*.1)
00049                                         sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,0);
00050                                 else sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00051                         }
00052                         if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] < 0){
00053                                 if(abs(panMotor.currentPosition - panMotor.maxValue) <
00054                                                 abs(panMotor.homePos-panMotor.maxValue)*.1)
00055                                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00056                                 else sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00057                         }
00058                         else if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00059                                 if(abs(panMotor.currentPosition - panMotor.minValue) <
00060                                                 abs(panMotor.homePos-panMotor.minValue)*.1)
00061                                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00062                                 else sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00063                         }
00064 
00065                 }
00066         }
00067         //Tell pan-tilt to stop if joystick message not meant for them
00068         else{
00069                 if(panMotor.isHoming || tiltMotor.isHoming) return;
00070                 sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00071                 sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,0);
00072         }
00073 }

00079 void ptzJoyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& msg){
00080                 //If the start and select buttons are pressed, enable boom control
00081                 if(msg->buttons[SELECT_BUTTON]>0 && msg->buttons[START_BUTTON]>0){
00082                         if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] > 0)
00083                                 sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,3000);
00084                         else if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] < 0)
00085                                 sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,-3000);
00086                         else sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,0);
00087                 }
00088                 //Joystick DPAD will control stepping of motors
00089                 else if(msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] != 0 || msg->axes[D_PAD_LEFT_RIGHT] !=0){
00090                         if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] > 0)
00091                                 sendPositionMessage(tiltMotor, -upDownStep, false);
00092                         else if (msg->axes[D_PAD_UP_DOWN] < 0)
00093                                 sendPositionMessage(tiltMotor, upDownStep, false);
00094                         if (msg->axes[D_PAD_LEFT_RIGHT] > 0)
00095                                 sendPositionMessage(panMotor, -leftRightStep, false);
00096                         else if (msg->axes[D_PAD_LEFT_RIGHT] < 0)
00097                                 sendPositionMessage(panMotor, leftRightStep, false);
00098                 }
00099                 //Control velocities with joysticks
00100                 else{
00101                         if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] < 0){
00102                                 if(abs(tiltMotor.currentPosition - tiltMotor.maxValue)
00103                                                 < abs(tiltMotor.homePos-tiltMotor.maxValue)*.1)
00104                                          sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,0);
00105                                 else sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00106                         }
00107                         else if (msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00108                                 if(abs(tiltMotor.currentPosition - tiltMotor.minValue) <
00109                                                 abs(tiltMotor.homePos-tiltMotor.minValue)*.1)

00111                                 else sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_VERTICAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00112                         }
00113                         if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] < 0){
00114                                 if(abs(panMotor.currentPosition - panMotor.maxValue) <
00115                                                 abs(panMotor.homePos-panMotor.maxValue)*.1)
00116                                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00117                                 else sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00118                         }
00119                         else if (msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS] >= 0){
00120                                 if(abs(panMotor.currentPosition - panMotor.minValue) <
00121                                                 abs(panMotor.homePos-panMotor.minValue)*.1)
00122                                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00123                                 else sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,(int)(msg->axes[LEFT_HORIZONTAL_AXIS]*-topSpeed));
00124                         }
00125 
00126                 }
00127 }

00133 void reconfigureCallback(oryx_manager::PTZ_managerConfig &config, uint32_t level){
00134         if(config.Home_Pan == true && previousConfig.Home_Pan == false){
00135                 panMotor.isHoming=true;
00136                 panMotor.maxValue=0;
00137                 panMotor.minValue=0;
00138                 sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,panMotor.homeVelocity);
00139         }
00140         if(config.Home_Tilt == true && previousConfig.Home_Tilt == false){
00141                 tiltMotor.isHoming=true;
00142                 tiltMotor.maxValue=0;
00143                 tiltMotor.minValue=0;
00144                 sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,tiltMotor.homeVelocity);
00145         }
00146         if(config.Home_Boom == true && previousConfig.Home_Boom == false){
00147                 boomMotor.isHoming=true;
00148                 boomMotor.maxValue=0;
00149                 boomMotor.minValue=0;
00150                 if(config.Home_Safely == true)sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,boomMotor.homeVelocity);
00151                 else {
00152                         driveBoomWithoutMonitoring = true;
00153                         sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,9000);
00154                 }
00155         }
00156         if(config.Home_Pan == false) panMotor.isHoming = false;
00157         if(config.Home_Tilt == false) tiltMotor.isHoming = false;
00158         if(config.Home_Boom == false){
00159                 sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,0);
00160                 boomMotor.isHoming = false;
00161         }
00162         previousConfig=config;
00163         //TODO: Enable control through the set angle sliders
00164 }
00165 
00166 /*
00167  * This publishes the angle of the camera. Right now, it incorrectly uses a quaternion message.
00168  * Right now, it is in degrees of rotation about the y and z axes. This is because we had issues
00169  * converting between degrees and quaternions. In the future, this should still be sent as a
00170  * quaternion, but should actually use the quaternion format.
00171  */
00172 void publishCameraAngle(){
00173         //TODO: Use actual quaternion format
00174         geometry_msgs::Quaternion msg;
00175         msg.z=panMotor.angle;
00176         msg.y=tiltMotor.angle;
00177         cameraOrientationPublisher.publish(msg);
00178 }
00179 
00183 void motorInfoCallback(const epos_manager::MotorInfo::ConstPtr& msg){
00184         if(msg->node_id == panMotor.nodeId){
00185                 //Get Position of motor
00186                 panMotor.currentPosition=msg->motor_position;
00187                 //If motor has discovered boundary points, and is in between them, allow user control
00188                 if(panMotor.maxValue!=0 && panMotor.minValue!=0 && !isMotorTooClose(panMotor))
00189                         panMotor.isReadyForControl=true;
00190                 //If it is homing mode, home it
00191                 if(panMotor.isHoming) homeMotor(&panMotor, msg);
00192                 //If motor is no longer homing and is too close stop it
00193                 else if(panMotor.isReadyForControl && isMotorTooClose(panMotor) ){
00194                         sendVelocityMessage(panMotor,0);
00195                 }
00196                 //Calculate and publish the camera angle
00197                 panMotor.angle =((double)(panMotor.currentPosition - panMotor.homePos))
00198                                 /PAN_MOTOR_GEAR_RATIO/512*90;
00199                 publishCameraAngle();
00200 
00201         }
00202         if(msg->node_id == tiltMotor.nodeId ){
00203                 tiltMotor.currentPosition = msg->motor_position;
00204                 if(tiltMotor.maxValue!=0 && tiltMotor.minValue!=0 && !isMotorTooClose(tiltMotor))
00205                         tiltMotor.isReadyForControl=true;
00206                 if (tiltMotor.isHoming) homeMotor(&tiltMotor, msg);
00207                 else if(tiltMotor.isReadyForControl && isMotorTooClose(tiltMotor)){
00208                         sendVelocityMessage(tiltMotor,0);
00209                 }
00210                 //Calculate and publish the camera angle
00211                 tiltMotor.angle =((double)(tiltMotor.currentPosition - tiltMotor.homePos))
00212                                 /TILT_MOTOR_GEAR_RATIO/512*90;
00213         }
00214         if(msg->node_id == boomMotor.nodeId ){
00215                 boomMotor.currentPosition=msg->motor_position;
00216                 if(boomMotor.maxValue!=0 && boomMotor.minValue!=0 && !isMotorTooClose(boomMotor))
00217                         boomMotor.isReadyForControl=true;
00218                 if (boomMotor.isHoming){
00219                         homeMotor(&boomMotor, msg);
00220                 }
00221                 else if(boomMotor.isReadyForControl && isMotorTooClose(boomMotor)){
00222                         sendVelocityMessage(boomMotor,0);
00223                 }
00224         }
00225 }
00226 
00230 bool isMotorTooClose(homingData motor){
00231         int maxDifference= abs(motor.homePos-motor.maxValue);
00232         int minDifference= abs(motor.homePos-motor.minValue);
00233         if( (abs(motor.currentPosition - motor.maxValue) < maxDifference*.1) ||
00234                         (abs(motor.currentPosition - motor.minValue) < minDifference*.1))
00235                         return true;
00236         return false;
00237 }
00238 
00242 void sendVelocityMessage(homingData motor, int velocity){
00243 
00244         epos_manager::EPOSControl controlMsg;
00245         controlMsg.node_id=motor.nodeId;
00246         controlMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::VELOCITY;
00247         controlMsg.setpoint=velocity;
00248         ptz_publisher.publish(controlMsg);
00249 }
00250 
00254 void sendPositionMessage(homingData motor, int setpoint, bool absolute){
00255         if(absolute){
00256                 if (setpoint < motor.minValue) setpoint = motor.minValue;
00257                 else if (setpoint > motor.maxValue) setpoint=motor.maxValue;
00258         }
00259         else{
00260                 if(motor.currentPosition+setpoint < motor.minValue) setpoint=0;
00261                 else if(motor.currentPosition+setpoint > motor.maxValue) setpoint=0;
00262         }
00263         epos_manager::EPOSControl controlMsg;
00264         controlMsg.node_id=motor.nodeId;
00265         if(absolute)controlMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE;
00266         else controlMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::RELATIVE_POSITION_IMMEDIATE;
00267         controlMsg.setpoint=setpoint;
00268         ptz_publisher.publish(controlMsg);
00269 }
00270 
00274 void homeMotor(homingData* motor, const epos_manager::MotorInfo::ConstPtr& msg){
00275                 //Ignore first few readings for a Motor, as they tend to spike
00276                 motor->isReadyForControl=false;
00277                 if(++motor->ignoreCounter >= motor->timesToIgnore){
00278                         //If the first limit has not been set and hard stop reached
00279                         if(motor->nodeId==PTZ_BOOM && driveBoomWithoutMonitoring){
00280                                 if(motor->ignoreCounter == motor->timesToIgnore+75){
00281                                         epos_manager::EPOSControl controlMsg;
00282                                         controlMsg.node_id=motor->nodeId;
00283                                         controlMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::VELOCITY;
00284                                         controlMsg.setpoint=motor->homeVelocity;
00285                                         motor->ignoreCounter =0;
00286                                         driveBoomWithoutMonitoring = false;
00287                                         ptz_publisher.publish(controlMsg);
00288                                         return;
00289                                 }
00290                                 else return;
00291                         }
00292                         if(abs(msg->motor_current) > motor->homeCurrent && motor->maxValue==0){
00293                                 //Generate Motor Message
00294                                 epos_manager::EPOSControl controlMsg;
00295                                 controlMsg.node_id=motor->nodeId;
00296                                 controlMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::VELOCITY;
00297                                 controlMsg.setpoint=-motor->homeVelocity;
00298                                 if(motor->nodeId == PTZ_BOOM){
00299                                         controlMsg.setpoint=0;
00300                                         motor->minValue=(long int)(msg->motor_position);
00301                                         motor->isHoming=false;
00302                                         driveBoomWithoutMonitoring=false;
00303                                 }
00304                                 ptz_publisher.publish(controlMsg);
00305                                 motor->maxValue=(long int)(msg->motor_position);
00306                                 motor->ignoreCounter=0;
00307                         }
00308                         //If the second limit has not been set and hard stop reached
00309                         else if (abs(msg->motor_current) > motor->homeCurrent && motor->minValue==0){
00310                                 epos_manager::EPOSControl controlMsg;
00311                                 motor->minValue=(long int)(msg->motor_position);
00312                                 motor->homePos=(motor->maxValue+motor->minValue)/2;
00313                                 controlMsg.node_id=motor->nodeId;
00314                                 controlMsg.control_mode=epos_manager::EPOSControl::ABSOLUTE_POSITION;
00315                                 controlMsg.setpoint=motor->homePos;
00316                                 ptz_publisher.publish(controlMsg);
00317                                 motor->isHoming=false;
00318 
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321 }

00326 int main (int argc, char **argv){
00327         ros::init(argc, argv, "PTZManager");
00328         ros::NodeHandle n;
00329         upDownStep=1000;
00330         leftRightStep=1000;
00331 
00332         panMotor.nodeId=PTZ_PAN;
00333         tiltMotor.nodeId=PTZ_TILT;
00334         boomMotor.nodeId=PTZ_BOOM;
00335 
00336         panMotor.timesToIgnore=5;
00337         tiltMotor.timesToIgnore=5;
00338         boomMotor.timesToIgnore=5;
00339 
00340         panMotor.homeVelocity = 1000;
00341         tiltMotor.homeVelocity = 1000;
00342         boomMotor.homeVelocity = 1000;
00343 
00344         panMotor.homeCurrent = 100;
00345         tiltMotor.homeCurrent = 100;
00346         boomMotor.homeCurrent = 100;
00347 
00348         panMotor.angle=0;
00349         tiltMotor.angle=0;
00350 
00351         ros::param::get("~Pan_Velocity",panMotor.homeVelocity);
00352         ros::param::get("~Pan_Current",panMotor.homeCurrent);
00353         ros::param::get("~Tilt_Velocity",tiltMotor.homeVelocity);
00354         ros::param::get("~Tilt_Current",tiltMotor.homeCurrent);
00355         ros::param::get("~Boom_Velocity",boomMotor.homeVelocity);
00356         ros::param::get("~Boom_Current",boomMotor.homeCurrent);
00357         ros::param::get("~Up_Down_Step",upDownStep);
00358         ros::param::get("~Left_Right_Step",leftRightStep);
00359 
00360         panMotor.isHoming=false;
00361         boomMotor.isHoming=false;
00362         tiltMotor.isHoming=false;
00363 
00364 
00365 
00366         ros::Subscriber joy_subscriber = n.subscribe("joy", 1, joyCallback);
00367         ros::Subscriber ptz_joy_subscriber = n.subscribe("OperatorJoy", 1, ptzJoyCallback);
00368         ros::Subscriber ptz_motor_info_subscriber = n.subscribe("motors/PTZ_Motors/Motor_Info", 1, motorInfoCallback);
00369 
00370         ptz_publisher = n.advertise<epos_manager::EPOSControl>("motors/PTZ_Motors/Motor_Control", 5);
00371         group_ptz_publisher = n.advertise<epos_manager::GroupEPOSControl>("motors/PTZ_Motors/Group_Motor_Control", 5);
00372         cameraOrientationPublisher = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Quaternion>("PTZ/Orientation",1);
00373 
00374         dynamic_reconfigure::Server<oryx_manager::PTZ_managerConfig> server;
00375         dynamic_reconfigure::Server<oryx_manager::PTZ_managerConfig>::CallbackType f;
00376 
00377         f = boost::bind(reconfigureCallback, _1 ,_2);
00378         server.setCallback(f);
00379 
00380         ros::spin();
00381 }
